about_the_game:
Do you want to play SPREAD in other languages? Wishlist the game and fill out this form so that we can get to know your demands!

Little Viny & Her Special Connection with Vines

Little Viny developed a strange disease which also blesses her with the power to control vine plants. Viny's mother received a letter from the owner of the Stone Vein Hot Spring Hotel, promising a cure for Viny's disease. On their first night in the hotel, a loud noise woke Viny. She couldn't find her mother anywhere. What's worse, the hotel has turned into a creepy death trap...


Solve Puzzles & Confront Danger

To navigate through the hidden rooms in this disturbing hotel, you need to complete puzzles utilizing Viny's special abilities. Control the vines and make them grow to interact with your surroundings and confront danger, until you piece together this hotel's unspeakable secrets, and find out what happened to Viny's mother...


A Run-Down Hotel with Dark Secrets

The Stone Vein Hot Spring Hotel had been known for its hot spring treatment that uses special minerals and vine essence. Guests came for a healing vacation, but they had no idea what they were really in for...

name: Spread

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i5
  • Graphics: No requirement
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: You might experience bugs or other issues if the game is run on Windows 7 or lower.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Spread is a horror puzzle game that pulls you into a dark, unsettling tale. Help Viny find her mother and escape from the death-trapped hot spring hotel. Solve puzzles and fight off creepy creatures utilizing the special power to control vine plants, and uncover the vile secrets of the hotel.
